# points()

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of map points associated with the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
func points() -> UnsafeMutablePointer<MKMapPoint>
```

## Return Value

An unsafe mutable array of [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapPoint] structures.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMultiPoint/pointCount] property specifies the number of points in the array.

## Related Documentation

- **Location and Maps Programming Guide**

## Accessing the points in the shape

- **pointCount**: The number of points associated with the shape.
- **location(atPointIndex:)**: Translates a point index into a unit distance along the shape.
- **locations(at:)**: Translates a point index set into a unit distance along the shape.
